activities: CMA will be performing ongoing monitoring and management of the Server Transformation Equipment and TSM Backup Environment for our client with locations in various EU countries.  CMA will not be storing any EU personal data on CMA systems.   We will only be accessing systems to ensure optimal health and operations of the server & storage hardware, virtualization software, and backup software.   CMA will have no access to client applications running on the servers we manage.
personaldata: CMA does not process any personal data.  We do have on-line access to server and storage systems that house personal data in EU countries.
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor program)
